question: NASA astronaut Peggy Whitson has set a new record for the most time spend in the space of ____ days.
explanation: NASA astronaut Peggy Whitson has set a new record for the most time spend in space 536 days. Peggy Whitson is the world's oldest and most experienced spacewoman. She has previously broken the record for the most spacewalks taken by a woman and she has overtaken astronaut Jeff Williams, who spent 534 days in space.
